definition: A person who unlawfully enters a property with the intention of committing theft or other criminal activities. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals involved in illegal break-ins or burglaries.

examples.german: Der Einbrecher hat das Fenster aufgebrochen.
examples.english: The burglar broke open the window.
